overview: Fred Ong, CFO and COO, brings 20 years of financial and operational experience to U-Systems. Prior to joining U-Systems, Mr. Ong was Vice President of Finance at R2 Technology, a venture backed medical device company that was successfully sold for $220 million. He was also Vice President of Finance and Operations at Mirapoint where he scaled the company from its early stage to eventual operating profits during his five-year tenure. He also held various other financial management positions and participated in mergers and acquisitions. Earlier in his career, Mr. Ong worked for Coopers and Lybrand, now PricewaterhouseCoopers, as an auditor. He is a graduate of the UC Berkeley Haas School of Business, and is a certified public accountant.

degrees.institution: UC Berkeley Haas School of Business

relationships.title: Chief Financial Officer and Chief Operating Officer
